attributes.action: Butler sloss is not the tight person to lead a fully independent inquiry into Child Abuse.
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to ensure that the head of the inquiry must be fully independent of any relationship with a serving member of the government or the establishment.
Butler sloss,brother was a member of the government when the files went missing and this is a major conflict of interest.
Please sign the petition to get the government to think again.
